pepc-e/force_direct.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  ====================================================================
00002 !
00003 !                              FORCE_DIRECT
00004 !
00005 !   Direct PP force sum for error estimates
00006 !
00007 !  ====================================================================
00008 
00009 subroutine force_direct(n,x,y,z,q, eps, const, ex, ey, ez, pot)
00010   implicit none
00011   real, intent(in) :: eps, const
00012   integer, intent(in) :: n
00013   real*8, intent(in), dimension(n) :: x, y, z, q  ! coords and charge 
00014   real*8,  dimension(n) :: ex, ey, ez, pot  ! fields and potential to return
00015 
00016   real*8 :: eps2, d, d3, dx, dy, dz
00017   integer :: i,j
00018 !  write (*,*) 'Direct sum params: ',eps,const
00019 !  write (*,'(a10,a20/(i6,4f15.3))') 'DIRECT | ','Initial buffers: ',(i, x(i), y(i), z(i), q(i),i=1,n) 
00020  eps2=eps**2
00021   ex(1:n) = 0.
00022   ey(1:n) = 0.
00023   ez(1:n) = 0.
00024   pot(1:n) = 0.
00025 
00026   !  PP contribution from simulation volume
00027 
00028   do  i=1,n
00029 !     write (*,*) i,'x_i=',x(i)
00030      do  j=1,n
00031         if (j.ne.i) then
00032            dx=x(i)-x(j)
00033            dy=y(i)-y(j)
00034            dz=z(i)-z(j)
00035            d=sqrt(dx**2+dy**2+dz**2+eps2)
00036            d3=d**3
00037            ex(i) = ex(i) + const*q(j)*dx/d3
00038            ey(i) = ey(i) + const*q(j)*dy/d3
00039            ez(i) = ez(i) + const*q(j)*dz/d3
00040            pot(i) = pot(i) + const*q(j)/d
00041 !          write (*,'(i5,a5,f12.3,a5,f12.3,a5,f12.3)') j,'q_j=',q(j),' x_j=',x(j), ' d=',d
00042         endif
00043      end do
00044   end do
00045 
00046 
00047 end subroutine force_direct
00048
